content: The iPhone 12 design is comfortable to hold, but the refresh is not a big one.
iPhone 12 mini is just the iPhone 12 in a smaller body, potentially the cheapest iPhone of 2021.
The iPhone 12's camera is incredible, especially handheld at night the wide lens is super useful.
The iPhone 12 offers little different as a mid-tier alternative to the Pro model iPhones.
Will post the full review for the iPhone 12 by evening, finalizing the points now.
I am looking at new features, battery life and performance in this review of iOS 18.3 update on iPhone 12 Pro
I will review the iOS 18.3 update on iPhone 12 Mini, and look at the new features and the battery life.
iPhone 12 is still the best video phone, don't upgrade if you're a normal user with a 13 or 14 Pro.
I have the iPhone 12 Pro and it's extremely fast. The cameras are great and it feels very solid. I like the flat edges better on this model.
I've had my iPhone 12 for eight months now and it is the first iPhone I've owned. Sadly, it's the most useless pile of garbage I've ever had.
I recently got the iPhone 12 Pro Max a couple weeks after it got released. I love it, especially the cameras, which are very high quality.
The OLED display is amazing it's really accurate and not over saturated. I have squeezed seven hours of screen on time with this phone.
The combination of the larger sensor, faster lens, improved stabilization, LIDAR, and processing power means that the iPhone 12 Pro Max is amazing.
The new dual camera has 12 MP on both cameras. The upper camera can autofocus faster, the lower one can capture more of the scene.
The iPhone 12 Pro Max is like an upscaled version of the iPhone 12 Pro, with a bigger display and battery and an improved camera setup.
Apple didn't offer anything extraordinary with this new series, only marginal improvements from the iPhone 12. Some major highlights were noticed.
The quality of the actual camera is very low, only 12 mp. However, the main issue is with the lenses. They're too wide for what is needed.
The 12 Pro Max camera is slightly better, but the difference is really small and I was hoping for a bigger jump.
I pre-ordered the iPhone 12 and this review bummed me out, but I'll still give it a shot with the bigger phone.
The iPhone 12 camera seems to have more advantages in darker settings. This review seems phoned in.
I'm switching from an X to a 12 mini because I'm not a heavy user and it will be perfect for me.
These reviews validate my decision to upgrade to the mini because I have very small hands.
I hope Apple keeps making smaller phones like the mini. I hope Samsung copies the idea.
I stopped using big phones and the mini will be replacing my iPhone X. Finally an iPhone I wanted!
Switching to the mini will give me a bigger screen while reducing the physical size, a double win!
I can’t wait for the mini. A smaller screen is more efficient and this is my dream phone.
This iPhone Mini is going to be a great screen upgrade for a correctly sized iPhone for me.
The 12 mini with a protective case is basically the same size as my old iPhone, but the screen is bigger!
I honestly love my 12 Pro Max. The modem and battery improvements alone were worth the upgrade for me.
I love my 12 Pro and I'm glad I didn't get the Max, the regular size is perfect for me.
No 120Hz is still a big dealbreaker for me. I expect a high refresh rate for this price.
I hope they fix the wireless charging issue with the iPhone 12 Pro. It only charges for a second.
I have the 12 Pro Max and I absolutely love it. I am just wondering when it will brick.
I got my 12 Pro on launch day. Great phone, I only wish it had 120Hz refresh rate.
My iPhone 12 sucks and was a waste of money. The camera doesn't focus and it lags a lot.
I prefer the curved design of the 11. The 11 design with the thinner bezels would be perfect.
I am on a iPhone 12 and two things keep me here, superior hardware/support and better apps.
I have an iPhone 12 and a Pixel. I much prefer my iPhones. Faster, supported years longer.
I went from iPhone 11 to pixel 5 and I disagree with everything you say. iOS is better.
I switched to the 12 from Pixel and I really hated it for a while. Now I finally appreciate it.
I moved to iphone 12 Pro Max for security and privacy and stayed for the camera and battery life.
I switched to Apple and regretting it, ended up selling it to my mother-in-law, disaster.
Using my wife's iphone 12 is a chore. I prefer the scrolling on the Pixel. Pixel5 ftw
I compared the iPhone 12 with my pixel 4 and the Pixel is more fluid, overall I like iOS though.
I use iOS only if I have invested in an apple watch and some airpods, Pixel ALL the way.
The notifications management on Android is better, I find Android OS on Google Pixel more user friendly.
I feel so limited with iOS. I always used Android. I have apps that helps me daily.
I was an Android set my whole life up until about a week ago when I got an iPhone 13 mini.
I am surprised you used FaceTime as much as you did! I came from Samsung and default to WhatsApp.
I switched it an iPhone 11. I’m thinking of buy a note just to have another large phone with a stylus.
I bought my wife the iPhone 13 Pro Max so I can use the phone for pics and dabble with iPhones.
Love google pixel devices and iPhones. Currently on iPhone 13 Pro Max because ATT gave me money.
I’m from Myanmar and I can see myself as heavy Apple user since I got iPhone, Mac and Watch.
I'm at 86% battery health after owning the 12pro for 14 months, is this normal?
The iPhone 12 has a brilliant camera, but some phone brands put too many cameras on the phone.
I took portrait pics with iPhone 12 and its yellowish always, not sure why this happens to the photos.
